customer_addr:

Baltic, OH 43804

citations.narrative:
* One fiberglass wallboard has an estimated four-inch circular area of missing fiberglass. Three dogs are in contact
with the affected wall board which is located in sheltered housing. Surfaces not maintained on a regular basis cannot be
readily cleaned and sanitized. The open area between the fiberglass and wood wall could serve as a collection area for
dirt, hair, fecal waste or other debris. The licensee must ensure that all surfaces must be maintained on a regular basis,
can be readily cleaned and sanitized or be replaced when worn. Correct by 4/17/23.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.1(c)(2) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
*     One fiberglass wallboard has an estimated four-inch circular area of missing fiberglass.   Three dogs are in contact 
with the affected wall board which is located in sheltered housing.   Surfaces not maintained on a regular basis cannot be 
readily cleaned and sanitized.   The open area between the fiberglass and wood wall could serve as a collection area for 
dirt, hair, fecal waste or other debris.  The licensee must ensure that all surfaces must be maintained on a regular basis, 
can be readily cleaned and sanitized or be replaced when worn.  Correct by  4/17/23. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
